      • Serialized Fields

        • currentState
          AtomicInteger currentState
          Current success rate/counter.
        • delayInUI
          AtomicInteger delayInUI
          Amount of seconds the UI sleeps in order to give a user a chance to read the screen, this value is calculated dynamically depending on the amount of pictures to be processed.
